description: This source file defines the Home component for a React-based frontend application. It renders the main page with sections including TV details, a banner, multiple rails of media thumbnails, subscription options, and a remote control overlay. It manages connectivity status, remote control interactions, and displays static assets with fallbacks.

methods.name: img
methods.description: Helper function to generate the path for local placeholder images from the /assets directory.

methods.name: pill
methods.description: Creates a styled span element representing a status pill with specific text and background color.

methods.name: openRemoteOverlay
methods.description: Sets state to show the remote control overlay.

methods.name: closeRemoteOverlay
methods.description: Sets state to hide the remote control overlay.
